About the Company: Umiya Tubes Ltd. is a steel pipe and tubes manufacturing company. It is engaged in manufacturing stainless decorative tubes and industrial pipes. It caters its services to chemical plants, dairy plants, ball bearings industries, petrochemical plants, solvent extraction plants, boilers, furniture industries, gas and oil distribution pipeline etc. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Gandhi Nagar, Gujarat.
